- :kbd:`Ctrl + V` æˆ– :kbd:`Ctrl + Y`\ ï¼šç²˜è´´/â€œæ‹‰æ‰¯â€n

.. _class_LineEdit_property_max_length:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`int<class_int>` **max_length** = ``0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_LineEdit_property_max_length>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_max_length**\ (\ value\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ )
- :ref:`int<class_int>` **get_max_length**\ (\ )

**LineEdit** ä¸­å¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥çš„æœ€å¤§å­—ç¬¦æ•°ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸º ``0``\ ï¼Œåˆ™æ²¡æœ‰é™åˆ¶ã€‚

å®šä¹‰é™åˆ¶åï¼Œå°†æˆªæ–­è¶…è¿‡ :ref:`max_length<class_LineEdit_property_max_length>` çš„å­—ç¬¦ã€‚åœ¨è®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦æ—¶ï¼Œå°†é€‚ç”¨äºç°æœ‰çš„ :ref:`text<class_LineEdit_property_text>` å†…å®¹ï¼Œä»¥åŠåœ¨ **LineEdit** ä¸­æ’å…¥ã€åŒ…æ‹¬ç²˜è´´è¿›æ¥çš„æ–°æ–‡æœ¬ã€‚å¦‚æœä»»ä½•è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬è¢«æˆªæ–­ï¼Œ\ :ref:`text_change_rejected<class_LineEdit_signal_text_change_rejected>` ä¿¡å·å°†ä»¥æˆªæ–­çš„å­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°å‘å‡ºã€‚

\ **ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š**\ 


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    text = "Hello world"
    max_length = 5
    # `text` å˜ä¸º "Hello"ã€‚
    max_length = 10
    text += " goodbye"
    # `text` å˜ä¸º "Hello good"ã€‚
    # `text_change_rejected` ä»¥ "bye" ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°å‘å‡ºã€‚

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    Text = "Hello world";
    MaxLength = 5;
    // `Text` å˜ä¸º "Hello"ã€‚
    MaxLength = 10;
    Text += " goodbye";
    // `text` å˜ä¸º "Hello good"ã€‚
    // `text_change_rejected` ä»¥ "bye" ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°å‘å‡ºã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•åªåœ¨ Linux ä¸Šå®ç°ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_LineEdit_property_secret:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **secret** = ``false`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_LineEdit_property_secret>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_secret**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_secret**\ (\ )

å¦‚æœä¸º ``true``\ ï¼Œåˆ™æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦éƒ½ä¼šè¢«æ›¿æ¢æˆå¯†ç å­—ç¬¦ï¼ˆè§ :ref:`secret_character<class_LineEdit_property_secret_character>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

.. _class_LineEdit_method_get_menu:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`PopupMenu<class_PopupMenu>` **get_menu**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_LineEdit_method_get_menu>`

è¿”å›è¯¥ **LineEdit** çš„ :ref:`PopupMenu<class_PopupMenu>`\ ã€‚é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå³é”®ç‚¹å‡» **LineEdit** ä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºè¯¥èœå•ã€‚

å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•é¡¹æˆ–ç§»é™¤æ ‡å‡†èœå•é¡¹ã€‚ç¡®ä¿ä½ çš„ ID ä¸ä¸æ ‡å‡† ID å†²çªï¼ˆè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`MenuItems<enum_LineEdit_MenuItems>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    func _ready():
        var menu = get_menu()
        # åœ¨â€œé‡åšâ€ä¹‹åç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰é¡¹ç›®ã€‚
        menu.item_count = menu.get_item_index(MENU_REDO) + 1
        # æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰é¡¹ç›®ã€‚
        menu.add_separator()
        menu.add_item("Insert Date", MENU_MAX + 1)
        # è¿æ¥å›è°ƒã€‚
        menu.id_pressed.connect(_on_item_pressed)
    
    func _on_item_pressed(id):
        if id == MENU_MAX + 1:
            insert_text_at_caret(Time.get_date_string_from_system())

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    public override void _Ready()
    {
        var menu = GetMenu();
        // åœ¨â€œé‡åšâ€ä¹‹åç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰é¡¹ç›®ã€‚
        menu.ItemCount = menu.GetItemIndex(LineEdit.MenuItems.Redo) + 1;
        // æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰é¡¹ç›®ã€‚
        menu.AddSeparator();
        menu.AddItem("Insert Date", LineEdit.MenuItems.Max + 1);
        // æ·»åŠ äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†å™¨ã€‚
        menu.IdPressed += OnItemPressed;
    }
    
    public void OnItemPressed(int id)
    {
        if (id == LineEdit.MenuItems.Max + 1)
        {
            InsertTextAtCaret(Time.GetDateStringFromSystem());
        }
    }



\ **è­¦å‘Šï¼š**\ è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¿…éœ€çš„å†…éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç§»é™¤å’Œé‡Šæ”¾å®ƒå¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´å´©æºƒã€‚å¦‚æœå¸Œæœ›éšè—å®ƒæˆ–å®ƒçš„ä»»ä½•å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒä»¬çš„ :ref:`Window.visible<class_Window_property_visible>` å±æ€§ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

é€‰æ‹© **LineEdit** å†…ä»‹äº ``from`` å’Œ ``to`` ä¹‹é—´çš„å­—ç¬¦ã€‚é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œ\ ``from`` ä½äºå¼€å¤´ï¼Œ\ ``to`` ä½äºç»“å°¾ã€‚

    text = "Welcome"
    select() # å°†é€‰æ‹©â€œWelcomeâ€ã€‚

    select(2, 5) # å°†é€‰æ‹©â€œlcoâ€ã€‚

    Select(); // å°†é€‰æ‹©â€œWelcomeâ€ã€‚
